docna.cdata!:
Ghana - Telecommunications Project : Loan
            1122 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Ghana - Telecommunications
            Project : Loan 1122 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Ghana - Telecommunications Project : Loan
            1122 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Ghana - Telecommunications
            Project : Loan 1122 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would include: installation
            of 18,300 lines of automatic switching equipment;
            construction of new microwave link between Kumasi and
            Takoradi and replacement of the Accra-Tema link; expansion
            of the telex service by addition of 300 lines; and provision
            of consultancy services and training of personnel.
